scenario_text.value:
What a terrible wound! We have to treat it at
once!
I’ll help too!

Wait, you guys! You shouldn’t move her around
so much!

Urngh... Where...is Lady...Miu? I...want to
see...her...
Okay, don’t worry! We’ll help you right away!

Is, is there anything we can do for wounds
like this?
I...don’t think so.
No... It can’t be. We didn’t make it in time?

You must be kidding. Can’t we do something
about this if we work together?!
Back me up, Aoi! I’m right, aren’t I?!
Calm down, Saki!

It’s no use... Her heartbeat’s getting slower
and slower...

Come on, you gotta hang in there! Breathe
already! We’ll save you, believe in us!

Lady Miu... I’m sorry... We co...couldn’t
protect it to the end...
We were too late...
I... I can’t believe this...

I’m sorry we couldn’t save you. If only we
had gotten here faster...
Aoi...

I’m... I’ll be okay, Takuma. The time for
tears comes later. I understand.

We have to save as many as we can now, to
prevent this tragedy from happening again.
You got that right.

Stay strong, okay, Saki? We’ll get through
this together!

Yeah... Sorry, I lost it a bit there. Gotta
stay strong!
Right, you guys... We’d better move on!
